Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, and salt. Mix in water, 1 egg white, and melted butter until a stiff dough forms. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth, which should take about 5 minutes.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until the edges are lightly browned.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, until golden brown.
